context_bundle.summary: Load testing evaluates system performance under load: Tools - Locust (Python-based, code-as-config, distributed), JMeter (Java, GUI, extensive protocols), K6 (JavaScript, modern, Grafana integration), Artillery (Node.js, YAML config). Metrics: Response time (p50, p95, p99), throughput (requests/sec), error rate, concurrent users. Patterns: Ramp-up (gradual increase), spike (sudden load), soak (sustained load), stress (find breaking point). Best practices: Test in staging, realistic data, monitor backend resources, establish baselines, automate in CI/CD.

onboarding.quick_start: Load testing tools: Locust (Python): pip install locust; Create locustfile.py: from locust import HttpUser, task, between; class MyUser(HttpUser): wait_time = between(1, 3); @task def index(self): self.client.get('/'); Run: locust -f locustfile.py --host=https://example.com --users=100 --spawn-rate=10. K6 (modern): k6 run script.js; Script: import http from 'k6/http'; import { sleep, check } from 'k6'; export let options = { stages: [{duration: '2m', target: 100}, {duration: '5m', target: 100}, {duration: '2m', target: 0}] }; export default function() { let res = http.get('https://example.com'); check(res, {'status 200': (r) => r.status === 200}); sleep(1); }; JMeter: jmeter -n -t test.jmx -l results.jtl -e -o ./report; # GUI for test plan creation. Artillery: npm install -g artillery; artillery quick --count 100 --num 10 https://example.com; # 100 virtual users, 10 req/sec. Analyze: p95 latency <500ms, error rate <1%, throughput meets target (e.g., 1000 req/sec).
common_patterns: Locust distributed: locust -f locustfile.py --master; locust -f locustfile.py --worker --master-host=master-ip; # Scale workers
K6 with thresholds: export let options = { thresholds: {'http_req_duration': ['p(95)<500'], 'http_req_failed': ['rate<0.01']} }; # Fail if p95 >500ms or >1% errors
JMeter ramp-up: Thread Group: 100 threads, Ramp-up 60s (gradual), Loop forever; Add HTTP Request sampler
Artillery config (YAML): config: {target: 'https://api.com', phases: [{duration: 120, arrivalRate: 10, rampTo: 50}]}; scenarios: [{flow: [{get: {url: '/api/users'}}]}]
Locust custom tasks: @task(3) def heavy_task(self): self.client.post('/process', json=data); @task(1) def light_task(self): self.client.get('/status'); # 3:1 ratio
K6 cloud integration: k6 cloud script.js; # Upload results to Grafana Cloud
Metrics analysis: import {Counter, Trend} from 'k6/metrics'; let errorRate = new Counter('errors'); let responseTrend = new Trend('response_time')
Soak test (Locust): locust -f locustfile.py --users=50 --spawn-rate=5 --run-time=2h; # 2-hour sustained load
Spike test (K6): stages: [{duration: '1m', target: 100}, {duration: '30s', target: 500}, {duration: '1m', target: 100}]; # Sudden spike
CI/CD integration: k6 run --out json=results.json script.js; # Export for CI analysis
